A

AbstractSoundFilter - Class in sound
Gives a default implementation of the SoundFilter interface.
AbstractSoundFilter() - Constructor for class sound.AbstractSoundFilter
Creates a new SoundFilter
addFrame(Image, long) - Method in class animations.Animation
Adds the Image to the animation for the given time period.
addImageLoadingTask(String) - Method in class concurrency.ThreadPool
Adds a task to load an Image.
addLineListener(LineListener) - Method in class sound.ClipDelegate
Equivalent to Line.addLineListener(LineListener)
addTask(Runnable) - Method in class concurrency.ThreadPool
Adds a task to the pool.
addTask(Object, Method, Object[]) - Method in class concurrency.ThreadPool
This method adds a new runnable to the end of the queue of tasks.
alwaysLoop() - Method in class sound.ClipDelegate
Makes it loop continiously.
Animation - Class in animations
The class that can animate Objects.
Animation() - Constructor for class animations.Animation
Creates a animation.
AnimeFrame - Class in animations
The AnimeFrame class binds together an image and it's duration.
AnimeFrame(Image, long) - Constructor for class animations.AnimeFrame
Creates an AnimeFrame with the given image and duration.
AnimeFrame(AnimeFrame) - Constructor for class animations.AnimeFrame
Creates an AnimeFrame that is a copy of the given frame.
available() - Method in class sound.ClipDelegate
Equivalent to DataLine.available()
